Class Warzone

java.lang.Object
org.example.galaxy_trucker.Model.Cards.Card
org.example.galaxy_trucker.Model.Cards.Warzone
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Warzone extends Card
Represents a Warzone card in the Galaxy Trucker game. This card creates combat scenarios where players must compete in various challenges and face punishments based on their performance. The warzone operates in phases: 1. Challenge phase - players compete in attack power, speed, or crew count 2. Punishment phase - the worst performer faces consequences like losing time, crew, cargo, or taking damage Requirements are checked in order: cannons (1), movement (2), humans (3) Punishments are applied in order: movement (1), humans (2), cargo (3), shots (4)
Version:
1.0
Author:
Galaxy Trucker Development Team
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Warzone

      public Warzone(int level, int time, GameBoard board, int[] RequirementOrder, int[] PunishmentOrder, int Punishment1, int Punishment2, int Punishment3, ArrayList<Integer> Punishment4)
      Constructs a new Warzone card with specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      level - The difficulty level of the card
      time - The time cost associated with this card
      board - The game board this card operates on
      RequirementOrder - Array defining the order of challenges (1=attack, 2=speed, 3=crew)
      PunishmentOrder - Array defining the order of punishments (1=time, 2=crew, 3=cargo, 4=shots)
      Punishment1 - Amount of time/movement to lose
      Punishment2 - Number of crew members to kill
      Punishment3 - Amount of cargo to lose
      Punishment4 - List of shot parameters (direction and size pairs)

    • Warzone

      public Warzone()
      Default constructor required for JSON deserialization. Initializes a Warzone object with default values.

  • Method Details

    • sendTypeLog

      public void sendTypeLog()
      Sends a log event to all players indicating the start of a Combat Zone. This method notifies all players that a warzone card has been activated.
      Overrides:
      sendTypeLog in class Card

    • CardEffect

      public void CardEffect() throws InterruptedException
      Activates the main effect of the Warzone card. Initializes the challenge sequence and sets up players for competition. If only one player remains, the card finishes immediately.
      Overrides:
      CardEffect in class Card
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted during execution

    • updateStates

      public void updateStates() throws InterruptedException
      Updates the state machine managing the warzone progression. Handles the transition between challenge phases and punishment phases. Manages player turns and determines when punishments should be applied.
      Overrides:
      updateStates in class Card
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted during execution

    • finishCard

      public void finishCard()
      Finalizes the warzone card execution. Resets all player states to base state and handles any players who lost during the warzone. Marks the card as finished.
      Overrides:
      finishCard in class Card

    • checkPower

      public void checkPower(double power, int numofDouble) throws InterruptedException
      Processes a player's attack power submission for the challenge. Evaluates the power value and energy consumption, then determines if this is the worst performance.
      Overrides:
      checkPower in class Card
      Parameters:
      power - The attack power value provided by the player
      numofDouble - The number of energy cells that need to be consumed
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted during execution

    • checkMovement

      public void checkMovement(int movement, int numofDouble) throws InterruptedException
      Processes a player's movement/speed submission for the challenge. Evaluates the movement value and energy consumption, then determines if this is the worst performance.
      Overrides:
      checkMovement in class Card
      Parameters:
      movement - The movement/speed value provided by the player
      numofDouble - The number of energy cells that need to be consumed
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted during execution

    • consumeEnergy

      public void consumeEnergy(ArrayList<IntegerPair> coordinates) throws InterruptedException
      Processes energy consumption for challenge requirements or punishments. Validates the energy cell coordinates and consumes energy from the specified locations.
      Overrides:
      consumeEnergy in class Card
      Parameters:
      coordinates - List of coordinates where energy should be consumed
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted during execution

    • consumeEnergy2

      public void consumeEnergy2(ArrayList<IntegerPair> coordinates) throws InterruptedException
      Processes energy consumption specifically for punishment scenarios. This is a separate method for handling energy consumption during cargo loss punishment.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - List of coordinates where energy should be consumed as punishment
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted during execution

    • checkStrength

      public void checkStrength() throws InterruptedException
      Evaluates and records the current player's attack strength. Compares the strength against the current minimum and updates the worst performer if necessary. Sends appropriate notifications to all players about the results.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted during execution

    • checkSpeed

      public void checkSpeed() throws InterruptedException
      Evaluates and records the current player's movement speed. Compares the speed against the current minimum and updates the worst performer if necessary. Sends appropriate notifications to all players about the results.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted during execution

    • checkPeople

      public void checkPeople() throws InterruptedException
      Evaluates all players' crew count automatically. Determines which player has the fewest crew members and marks them as the worst performer. This challenge doesn't require player input as crew count is automatically calculated.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted during execution

    • loseTime

      public void loseTime() throws InterruptedException
      Applies the time/movement loss punishment to the worst performing player. Moves the player backward on the game track by the specified punishment amount.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted during execution

    • killHumans

      public void killHumans(ArrayList<IntegerPair> coordinates) throws InterruptedException
      Legacy method for cargo loss punishment (currently unused). This method was likely replaced by the more comprehensive loseCargo method.
      Overrides:
      killHumans in class Card
      Parameters:
      coordinates - A list of IntegerPair objects representing the coordinates where actions will take place.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the operation is interrupted during execution.

    • continueCard

      public void continueCard() throws InterruptedException
      Continues the warzone card execution, specifically handling the shot punishment phase. Processes each shot in the punishment sequence, determining hit locations and damage. Handles both small shots (defendable) and large shots (automatic destruction).
      Overrides:
      continueCard in class Card
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted during execution

    • DefendFromSmall

      public void DefendFromSmall(IntegerPair energy, Player player) throws InterruptedException
      Defends against a small shot attack during the punishment phase. The player can choose to use energy to activate a shield or take damage. If energy is provided, validates that the shield defends the correct side and consumes energy. If no energy is provided, the hit location is destroyed.
      Overrides:
      DefendFromSmall in class Card
      Parameters:
      energy - The coordinates of the energy cell to use for defense, or null to take damage
      player - The player defending against the attack
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted during execution
      InvalidDefenceEceptiopn - if the shield doesn't defend the correct side
      ImpossibleBoardChangeException - if there's no energy available at the specified location

    • keepGoing

      public void keepGoing() throws InterruptedException
      Continues the warzone card execution after handling destruction or other interruptions. This method resumes the shot punishment sequence where it left off.
      Overrides:
      keepGoing in class Card
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted during execution

    • loseCargo

      public void loseCargo(IntegerPair coord, int index) throws InterruptedException
      Handles the cargo loss punishment by forcing the player to give up their most valuable goods. The player must select cargo from storage compartments in order of highest value first. If no cargo remains, energy is consumed instead as an alternative punishment.
      Overrides:
      loseCargo in class Card
      Parameters:
      coord - The coordinates of the storage compartment containing the cargo to lose
      index - The index of the specific cargo item within the storage compartment
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted during execution
      InvalidInput - if the coordinates don't contain a storage or the index is invalid

    • getRequirementsType

      public int[] getRequirementsType()
      Gets the array defining the order of requirement checks for challenges.
      Returns:
      Array where 1=cannons/attack, 2=movement/speed, 3=humans/crew

    • setRequirementsType

      public void setRequirementsType(int requirementsType)
      Sets the requirements type for challenges. This method creates a single-element array from the provided value.
      Parameters:
      requirementsType - The requirement type (1=attack, 2=speed, 3=crew)

    • getPunishmentType

      public int[] getPunishmentType()
      Gets the array defining the order of punishment types to be applied.
      Returns:
      Array where 1=movement penalty, 2=kill humans, 3=lose cargo, 4=take shots

    • setPunishmentType

      public void setPunishmentType(int punishmentType)
      Sets the punishment type order. This method creates a single-element array from the provided value.
      Parameters:
      punishmentType - The punishment type (1=time, 2=crew, 3=cargo, 4=shots)

    • getPunishmentShots

      public ArrayList<Integer> getPunishmentShots()
      Gets the list of shot parameters for combat punishment. Each pair of values represents direction and size for each shot.
      Returns:
      ArrayList containing shot parameters (direction, size pairs)

    • setPunishmentShots

      public void setPunishmentShots(ArrayList<Integer> punishmentShots)
      Sets the shot punishment parameters.
      Parameters:
      punishmentShots - ArrayList of shot parameters where each pair represents (direction, size)
